00128         KviPointerList<QString> * completeCommandAllocateResult(const QString &szCommandBegin)
00129         {
00130                 KviPointerList<QString> *p=new KviPointerList<QString>;
00131                 p->setAutoDelete(true);
00132                 completeCommand(szCommandBegin,p);
00133                 return p;
00134         }
